# The `SetContents` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A wrapper around a set that has semantics for handling unions and intersections with a &quot;universal&quot; set that contains all elements. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>struct llvm::SetState::SetContents</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

A wrapper around a set that has semantics for handling unions and intersections with a &quot;universal&quot; set that contains all elements.

Definition at line 3054 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/attributor-h">Attributor.h</a>.
